actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to settle claims relating to certain allotted Indian lands of the White Earth Indian Reservation, quiet titles to such lands, and for other purposes.
short_title: White Earth Allotment Claims Settlement Act of 1982

summary.text: White Earth Allotment Claims Settlement Act of 1982 - Provides for the settlement of claims relating to trust allotments of land granted to Chippewa Indians of the White Earth Reservation, Minnesota, and for the quiet of titles to such lands.

titles.title: White Earth Allotment Claims Settlement Act of 1982
A bill to settle claims relating to certain allotted Indian lands of the White Earth Indian Reservation, quiet titles to such lands, and for other purposes.
